item.description:
Good Morning:

Join us for a super brunch at York Harbor Inn! We always have a great time here, so we are looking forward to having you join us . Here is the link to York Harbor Inn:

http://www.yorkharbor...


Here is the link to their Sunday brunch menu:

http://www.yorkharbor...


My own personal favorite is their 3 egg avocado and crabmeat omelet

From there we will go on a hike, site to be determined dependent on weather conditions. It will either be York Beach just down the road or Mount Agamenticus about 9 miles west of York Harbor Inn. Estimate about 1 1/2 hours for the hike - possibly longer depending on weather. If there is snow on the ground, Mount A would be the preferred choice.

Look forward to having you join us then. Happy Holidays!

Randy
RandyS@maine.rr.com
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet inside. One of the doors is on the parking lot side of the building.
item.name: Brunch at York Harbor Inn followed by Hike!
